Z-Shape Profile Definition
==========================



```
concept {
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D_0
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D_1
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:Depth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_0
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:FlangeWidth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_1
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:WebThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_2
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:FlangeThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_3
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:FilletRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure_0
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:EdgeRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure_1
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint_0
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint_1
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:RefDirection -> IfcDirection_0
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:RefDirection -> IfcDirection_1
}
```
